io.elegie.luchess.app.lucene4x.index.manager

Class ReaderTemplate<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.elegie.luchess.app.lucene4x.index.manager.ReaderTemplate<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the value returned by the read method.

    public abstract class ReaderTemplate<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class lets us encapsulate a read in the index, managing the lifecycle of reader accesses. We want to make sure that the reader obtained will not be closed by another thread during the execution of the query.

      • doRead

        protected abstract T doRead(ReaderTemplate.ReaderTemplateArg arg)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Subclasses should put their domain logic in this method. They should also never alter the lifecycle of the reader and analyzer objects.
        Parameters:
        arg -
        Returns:
        The result of the domain processing.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
